title:
Hello everyone, Happy Thursday! 

Gentle reminder for our students & instructors - There will be no live session on Monday 10th April as it is Easter Monday. Instead, sessions next week will take place between Tuesday 11th April through to Friday 14th April.

We hope you have a lovely Easter weekend!

Calling all aspiring coders! 

New Sponsorship Opportunities Available - Apply now for a sponsored place in our degree program supported by leading companies. 
 
Thanks to our valued sponsors, including Google, Microsoft, and Amazon, we are able to offer full scholarships for deserving candidates. 

Take a leap towards your tech career with Code For Girls!

Code For Girls Recognized with Prestigious Tech Magazine Award - Celebrating our commitment to closing the gender gap in the tech industry. We are thrilled to announce that Code For Girls has been honored with the 'Diversity and Inclusion Initiative of the Year' award by prestigious Tech4Time Magazine. This recognition highlights our impactful efforts in empowering women through free coding education.

Hi everyone, 

Just a quick couple of announcements from us: 

Foundation Assessment 2 grades are due to be emailed to you this weekend. If you have any issues regarding them, please do not reply to the email - contact your instructors or the Programmes Team on Slack. If you did not receive a passing grade we will contact you next week with information on next steps.

We are currently preparing to kick-off our Summer cohort which, although very exciting, does require a lot of time - we may be a bit slower to respond to messages (as well as it being a Bank Holiday weekend) but please rest assured we will do our best to respond to all queries promptly.

We're thrilled to announce our latest industry partnerships - Join Code For Girls and gain access to exclusive opportunities and connections. We have partnered with top tech companies, including Facebook, Spotify, and IBM, to provide mentorship programs, internships, and networking events. Take advantage of these collaborations to supercharge your tech journey.

Hi everyone, 

we hope you’re having a great week so far! 

Now that you are in your Specialisation weeks and starting your project we wanted to share with you a template of a project log. Please make a copy of the template and use this project sheet to log in the time you’ve spent on your project. This will need to be submitted as a group to your instructors with your project at the end.

Thank you!

Hi everyone, - we hope you’re all having a great week!

As the project deadline is nearing, just a couple of announcements from us:

We wanted to let you all know that is not required of you to submit the presentation slide deck for your group project on Sunday 28th May, as this is purely for presentation purposes and will not be marked separately.

We have received many questions regarding the project log. This is a group submission and will need to be submitted on Sunday 28th May with your project code. If you have done the log individually, please could you copy and paste your work into one ‘master’ group sheet along with the rest of your team members.

If you have any questions or concerns, please message us here on Slack. 

Thank You!

Hello everyone, 

A gentle reminder for our students & instructors - There will be no live session tonight (Monday 29th May) as it is a Bank Holiday. Instead, sessions this week will take place between Tuesday 30th May through to Friday 2nd June. 

We hope you’re all having a lovely weekend!

CONGRATULATIONS!! 

A massive congratulations to you all on completing the CFGdegree! This is a fantastic achievement and we hope you are really proud of yourselves. It’s been a pleasure to have you all on the course and we wish you all the best for your future journeys into tech. 

We hope that you enjoyed your studies with us. We are always keen to hear your feedback, so please could you complete the Specialisation Module MEQ and Student Satisfaction Survey sent to your email. 

Thank You

An exciting learning opportunity for the CFG community, sponsored by EKO! 

Embark on an exciting journey into the captivating world of Interactive Websites with our latest MOOC offering! 

Get ready to unlock the power of Web Development and create digital experiences that will leave users spellbound!
